title: Jonny Lieberman (Motor Trend)
description:
Jonny Lieberman is the Senior Features Editor at Motor Trend and a talking head on Spike’s Car Radio. We talk about his time at Pebble Beach, driving single-seater Ferraris, why you should never touch a Fiesta ST, the Lucid Air, what the Wrangler has that Bronco doesn't, and answer lots of Q&A.

Jonny Lieberman is the Senior Features Editor ad Motor Trend and a talking head on Spike’s Car Radio.

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
